author: kokoberry
title: QUIZ: Which Type Of Sheet Mask Should You Try?
text:
Shares 178   
The popularity of sheet masks continues to grow as more and more people around the world experience them. Sheet masks are an inexpensive method to boost your skin in a short amount of time. They’re basically instant facials that you can apply regularly. 
innisfree’s It’s Real Squeeze Masks are especially popular due to their affordable price, natural ingredients, and great results. Take the quiz below to find out what type of sheet mask you should try!
